events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident that occurred on a rainy day resulting in significant front-end damage to the vehicle.
Assigned the claim to the Auto Accident cluster after verifying the keywords related to vehicle collision and damage.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to handle the customer's case and provide assistance moving forward.
Acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and informed the customer about the expected procedure and timelines.
Requested the customer submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates for further processing.
Received all requested documents from the policyholder including police report and several images of the vehicle damage.
Initiated investigation to verify accident details, assess vehicle damage, and validate the customer's claim information.
Completed investigation confirming the accident was accurately reported and damage aligns with the policy coverage terms.
Proposed a settlement amount that covers vehicle repairs and associated costs according to the terms of the insurance policy.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely handling of the claim.
Approved the claim formally after the customer agreed to the settlement and all internal checks were completed successfully.
Issued payment to the repair shop as per the approved claim settlement to cover auto repair expenses.
The claim was officially closed following payment disbursal and confirmation that repairs were underway as planned.
Archived the full claim file and supporting documentation according to company record-keeping policies.
